description: Demonstrates comprehensive understanding of relevant concepts, theories, and principles. Shows ability to explain concepts clearly and accurately.
indicators: Excellent: Clear, accurate, and comprehensive explanation of all relevant concepts
Good: Generally accurate understanding with minor gaps or imprecisions
Satisfactory: Basic understanding demonstrated but some concepts unclear or incorrect
Needs Improvement: Significant gaps in understanding or multiple incorrect explanations

description: Effectively applies concepts to solve problems or analyze scenarios. Demonstrates analytical thinking and appropriate use of methodologies.
indicators: Excellent: Sophisticated application with clear reasoning and appropriate methodology
Good: Correct application with mostly clear reasoning
Satisfactory: Basic application but reasoning unclear or methodology inappropriate
Needs Improvement: Incorrect application or lack of clear reasoning

description: Clear, well-organized writing that effectively communicates ideas. Proper grammar, spelling, and professional tone.
indicators: Excellent: Exceptionally clear, well-organized, and professional writing
Good: Generally clear and well-organized with minor issues
Satisfactory: Adequate communication but organization or clarity issues present
Needs Improvement: Poor organization, unclear communication, or numerous errors

description: Appropriate use of sources, proper citations, and integration of external information. Demonstrates research skills.
indicators: Excellent: Excellent use of diverse, relevant sources with proper citations
Good: Good use of sources with mostly proper citations
Satisfactory: Adequate sources but citation issues or limited variety
Needs Improvement: Insufficient sources, improper citations, or lack of research
